alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Mellette; Southern Jackson; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 01 at 2:39AM MDT until October 02 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Bennett County, Mellette County, Todd County, Tripp County and Southern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...From 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ this morning to midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Mellette; Southern Jackson; Todd; Tripp
